[阳]
An unorthodox variant simplified from 陽 ( 昜 → 日 ) which can be found in various historical dictionaries such as the Kangxi dictionary .
Eventually adopted as an official simplified character by the People's Republic of China in 1956.

[陽]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *laŋ ): semantic 阜 ( “ hill ” ) + phonetic 昜 ( OC *laŋ , “ sunshine ” ) . 昜 is the original character for this word, 阜 was added later.
